price: A cikin dũniya da Lãhira. Kuma suna tambayar ka game da marãyu.* Ka ce: "Kyautatãwa gare su ne mafi alhẽri, kuma idan kun haɗa da su (wajen abinci), to, 'yan'uwanku ne; kuma Allah Yana sanin mai ɓãtãwa daga mai kyautatãwa. Kuma dã Allah Yã so, dã Ya tsananta muku. Lalle ne Allah Mabuwãyi ne, Mai hikima.
arabic: فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۗ وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلۡيَتَٰمَىٰۖ قُلۡ إِصۡلَاحٞ لَّهُمۡ خَيۡرٞۖ وَإِن تُخَالِطُوهُمۡ فَإِخۡوَٰنُكُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُصۡلِحِۚ وَلَوۡ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَعۡنَتَكُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٞ
footnotes: * Bayãnin gama abinci da yãra marãyu mãsu dũkiyar kansu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati wayasalūnaka ʿani al-yatāmā qul iṣ'lāḥun lahum khayrun wa-in tukhāliṭūhum fa-ikh'wānukum wal-lahu yaʿlamu al-muf'sida mina al-muṣ'liḥi walaw shāa al-lahu la-aʿnatakum inna al-laha ʿazīzun ḥakīmun
